messages.subject: If everyone homeschooled....
messages.msgSnippet: I chose to start a business from home after having my first one.... DH decided to quit a full time employed job to go contracting so he could work as many
messages.messageBody:
I chose to start a business from home after having my first one.... DH
decided to quit a full time employed job to go contracting so he could work
as many hours as he could around our children... DH is gradually quitting
his job and working with me in my business so that we can both be with the
kids on and off all day and get to go on trips with them.... All the while
being unschooled and doing things they enjoy... Personally I cannot imagine
a better lifestyle where we get to decide what we do and when we do it...
Having our life the way it is, is part of living an unschooled life.

Dawn
********************
Dawn Falbe
Astrologer Coach
(520) 312-5300

Enlightening you on how to discover and live your Soul Purpose
"The people who get on in this world are people who get up and look for the
circumstances they want, and, if they can't find them, make them." - George
Bernard Shaw
"The only time my education was interrupted was when I was in school" -
George Bernard Shaw
